content.tagline: A rising star with unmatched passion. Combining raw talent with relentless dedication. Creating excellence through determination and teamwork.

about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate baseball player with a love for the game that started at the age of 5. My dedication to practice and natural athleticism has helped me excel in multiple positions.
about.paragraph2: What sets me apart is my exceptional baseball IQ and deep respect for the game. I study the sport constantly, analyzing game situations and learning from every play. My coaches often commend my ability to read the game and make smart decisions under pressure.
about.paragraph3: I bring grit and determination to every practice and game. Whether it's early morning training sessions or late-night fielding practice, I'm always looking for ways to improve. My work ethic is unmatched - I believe that success comes from consistent effort and a never-quit attitude.

coreValues: Respect for the game and its traditions
